statements: SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerData;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM CustomerData WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM CustomerData WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, address FROM CustomerData WHERE purchase_amount < 500;
SELECT purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM CustomerData ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM CustomerData WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM CustomerData WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM CustomerData GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchase_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerData WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, registration_date, customer_id FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, registration_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, registration_date FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customers.customer_name, sales.sale_amount, sales.sale_date FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.customer_id = products.product_id WHERE customers.customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE in_stock = TRUE ORDER BY category ASC, price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, category, price, quantity FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500.00;
SELECT customer_name, email, order_date, total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE total_amount < 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01' AND total_amount > 1000;
SELECT sale_id, quantity, sale_date FROM sales WHERE product_id = 3 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, o.order_date, p.product_name, s.quantity FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN sales s ON o.order_id = s.order_id JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.customer_id = 1;

SELECT DISTINCT c.customer_name, o.order_date, p.product_name, s.quantity FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN sales s ON o.order_id = s.order_id JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE s.quantity > 5;
